pullrequest.title: Pose frame semantics: describe legacy behavior

content.raw:
I agree that it may be confusing in its current state, but I want to be able to show visually how the frames are defined, and it's hard to see that if the child link and joint frames are collocated.

I'd rather keep the figures like this but add some explanatory text about why they are different. How does that sound?
content.html:
I agree that it may be confusing in its current state, but I want to be able to show visually how the frames are defined, and it's hard to see that if the child link and joint frames are collocated.

I'd rather keep the figures like this but add some explanatory text about why they are different. How does that sound?
